text: DZPA (873 kHz) is a Catholic AM radio station owned by Abra Community Broadcasting Corporation, the media arm of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Bangued. Its studios are located at the Ground Floor, DZPA Bldg., Rizal St. cor Zamora St., Brgy. Zone 4, Bangued, Abra.Diocese of BanguedChurch Radio Service Links People In Remote Northern MountainsArmed men attack radio station in AbraAbra’s Catholic radio station marks 50 years ==References== Category:Catholic radio stations Category:Radio stations in the Philippines
title: DZPA
